html:
In the day "In that day"— ,ההוא ביום ,bayom hahu ,. The word ,ההוא ,hahu ,is added in two MSS. of Kennicott's, and was in the copies from which the Septuagint and Vulgate translated: ,εν τῃ ἡμερᾳ εκεινῃ ,, in die illa ,, (,ᾑ αναπαυσει ,, MS. Pachom. adding ,ה ), in that day. This is a matter of no great consequence: however, it restores the text to the common form, almost constantly used on such occasions; and is one among many instances of a word apparently lost out of the printed copies.

,
